reviews.review:
This game is kinda trash. Yea, it's fun while you go through campain on Expert difficulty with friends. Bad side - it's hard to follow that "story line", as far as there is no videos at all. You just need to follow what some persons from your team say and that's the story. Yea, I know that is not the main purpose of the game, but that would be nice.

Anyway, after playing few hours I got a feeling that it's totally boring. After some more time you can see how all that "mechanic" works. So now versus games become boring too, because if you play as "infected" and your mates are newbies - you will loose. If you are survivours - just keep together (but watch sides) and avoid open places and you are winners. 1 vs 1 versus is not balanced, as far as bots never let one "infected" to damage human player, so actually playing 1 vs 1+3.

Yea, weapons amount is so poor, this also reduces fun.

Idk what can keep you playing the game more than few hours, especially when people say that L4D2 has almost every map of this one (except one map of 20 of "longest time survive" type, not a big deal, right?). I did not play it yet, so can't say for sure.

I do not like those positive reviews with "10/10!", "best game in my life" etc. from people which have 2-9 hours of playtime. How fun it should be that one did spend just few hours? Ask yourself. "Years after Left 4 Dead was released, I'm still playing and enjoying this game." - guy has 15 hours on account. Yea, no offences, but doesn't this look falsey to you?

Anyway. Everyone (seems so) have own opinion, and I do not point to persons but reasons.

Do not recomment this game, just walk away and try L4D2. This way you'll save some time and money.
It worth to be bought on sales for 2-5 hours of play.
Exelente juego. Con mucho Terror jaja
If you guys want to be a true zombie killer, pick both 1&2 up and play it. It is that good. T H A T G O O D
